owl:Ontology.dc:creator: María Poveda Villalón
Serge Chávez Feria
owl:Ontology.dc:description: The Key Performance Indicator module aims to model the metrics defined at the beginning of building renovation activities to monitor the conformance with typical requirements related to energy efficient buildings.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Key Performance Indicator ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links to the building the project is about.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related building

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links the project with its respective documentation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related documentation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates what are the building elements affected by the renovation measure.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related element

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to link a project with a set of goals.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related goal

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: relates an entity with specific kpi definitions.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related Kpi

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an entity with specific kpi values.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related Kpi value

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates what are the layers of a specific building element affected by the renovation measure.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related layer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Related cost to the material layer.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related material layer cost

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an scenario with the renovation measures to be taken.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related measure

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a KPI value with the parameters used for its calculation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related parameter

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an entity with a project.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related project

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an entity with a renovation scenario.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related scenario

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship used to decompose a project goal into more specific sub-goals.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related sub goal

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an entity with a unit of measure.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: unit of measure

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the calculation period of a KPI.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has calculation period

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A KPI value quantifies a specific KPI.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: quantify Kpi

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property to add a time stamp to a KPI value.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: refers to time

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes the format of the information object.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: format

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Describe the location URI of the file.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Affected area of the building element due to a renovation measure.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: area

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The ISO country code where the project is being developed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: country code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date when the project was created.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: creation date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Global ID used in the IFC file.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ifc identifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Upper limit to define a KPI Value.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: max value

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Lower limit to define a KPI Value.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: min value

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Tolerance error in the value of a KPI.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: tolerance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The most recent editing date of a project.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: update date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Position of the layer within the set of layers that compose a building element.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: position

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Numeric quantity of a KPI value.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has value

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The building element comprises all elements that are primarily part of the construction of a building, i.e., its structural and space separating system. Building elements are all physically existent and tangible things.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Building

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An element is a generalization of all components that make up an AEC product.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Element

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Goals or subgoals describe the objetives to be achieved within the renovation process. For instance: "Stay within estimated budget"
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Goal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Key performance indicator values calculated for a specific renovation project and scenario.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Kpi Value

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Key performance indicators related to building renovation projects
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Kpi

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Costs associated to the material layers such as installation, disposal, or maintenance costs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Laye cost

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represent the parameters or variables that are used to measure the performance of an specific task, and are useful to compute project KPI's.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Performance parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A project is a temporary endeavor undertaken to achieve defined objectives (definition taken from DBpedia).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Project

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Renovation action to be applied on the project. For example: Renovation of external facade insulation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Renovation measure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The simluation of a building renovation work.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Scenario

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A single and identifiable part of an element which is constructed of a number of layers (one or more).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material layer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Time extent; duration of a time interval separate from its particular start position.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temporal duration

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Key Performance Indicator (KPI) is a type of performance measurement. KPIs evaluate the success of an organization or of a particular activity in which it engages. (Definition taken from FIWARE)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Key performance indicator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Key Performance Indicator assessment represents the assessment of a KPI calculated by a given agent in a given time.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Key performance indicator assessment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called "watt". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of the Smart Appliances ontology, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Unit of measure
